plot: The life of Gabo, a writer chasing success, changed dramatically when he finds out that Joel, a famous writer is about to publish a book with the same title as a novel owned by Gabo &"the Cave of the Secrets&". To all this commotion, Joel will suggest a deal but after accepting Gabo's life becomes a complete nightmare.   Written by  Anonymous
title: La cueva de los secretos
